alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 07 at 3:28PM MST until February 09 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...In Colorado, Yuma, Kit Carson and Cheyenne Counties. In Kansas, Wallace and Greeley Counties. * WHEN...Thursday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The worst of the winds should occur during the morning. The high winds may cause reduced visibilities in the falling snow.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County
